attributes.action: to give the public sector  workers i.e.nurses, a better pay increase than 1.9% and pay it as one lump sum and not split as is proposed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Pay-pledge/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
